segments.text: My eyes keep returning to that precarious stool the boy is on.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Its legs are splayed out, looking incredibly unstable beneath him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's really stretching to reach those cookies, his body completely extended.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can just imagine it wobbling back and forth with every move he makes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The way it's tilted, it looks like it could tip backward at any moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It makes me feel quite anxious just watching him up there.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He could fall and hurt himself badly, perhaps even hit his head.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The thought of him crashing down is truly upsetting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a dangerous situation that no one seems to be aware of.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Poor kid, he's just trying to get a cookie, but the risk is so high.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can almost hear the clatter of the stool and the cookie jar breaking.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole situation fills me with a sense of dread.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish someone would stabilize that stool before it's too late.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a shame that such a simple act could end so poorly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just hope he doesn't get hurt; it makes me feel quite sad.
segments.speaker: PAR
